title: Google's Fall Pixel Event - Everything You Need To Know
description: On this week's episode of the Android Central Podcast, Shruti Shekar, Jerry Hildenbrand, Andrew Myrick, and Nick Sutrich discuss all the fallout from the fall Pixel event including the Google Pixel 8 & Google Pixel Watch 2, Google bringing Bard to Google Assistant, the Pixel 8 getting updates until 2030, hands-on with the Meta Quest 3, and more! Links:  Everything announced at the Made by Google event - Android Central Made by Google event 2023 live blog - Android Central Google Pixel 8 hands-on: The AI powerhouse phone - Android Central Google Pixel Watch 2 hands-on: Finally fit to replace Fitbit - Android Central Google Assistant is finally getting the Bard upgrade we've been wanting - Android Central Pixel 8 and 8 Pro will get Android OS updates until 2030 — that's a game-changer - Android Central Meta Quest 3 review: The best VR headset you can buy - Android Central Follow us on Twitter: @AndroidCentral @Shruti_Shekar @gbhil @AndyMyrick @Gwanatu
author: Android Central
